translations.translation: The data streams allow you to direct your logs in real time to a specific category as soon as they arrive on Logs Data Platform. If you have multiple streams, you can also: Easily classify messages based on their source, application, or origin server, and create flow-sensitive privacy levels, which will allow you to distribute your access only to authorized persons. The tokens here are write tokens that allow you to route the logs to the correct stream. In general, having different streams greatly facilitates the search for your logs. No need to exclude results from another system or application.
Are you sure you want to delete the data stream: {{stream}} ?
Follow the receipt of your logs in real time via the WebSocket protocol
Archive your logs safely for years
Notify me by e-mail when an archive is available
The data stream has been successfully created.
The data stream has been successfully updated.
The data stream has been successfully deleted.
The token value has been successfully copied to your clipboard, use CTRL+V to paste it in your screen.
Graylog url not found for stream {{stream}}.
An error has occurred while deleting a data stream: {{message}}
An error has occurred while updating a data stream: {{message}}
An error has occurred while creating a data stream: {{message}}
An error has occurred while retrieving data stream: {{message}}
An error has occurred while retrieving data streams: {{message}}
An error has occurred while retrieving data stream quota: {{message}}
An error has occurred while retrieving data stream notifiations: {{message}}
An error has occurred while retrieving data stream notifiations: {{message}}
Your browser does not support copy to clipboard. Please upgrade browser to latest version. Here is the token value to enter for stream {{stream}}: {{token_value}}
Connected to WebSocket, waiting for messages...
Error occuried while connecting to WebSocket: {{message}}
WebSocket address is not available for stream {{stream}}. Please retry later.
WebSocket address has been successfully copied to your clipboard, use CTRL+V to paste it in your screen.
Your browser does not support copy to clipboard. Please upgrade browser to latest version. Here is the WebSocket address for stream {{stream}}: {{url}}
The command line for the format {{type}} has been scuccessfully copied to your clipboard. Use CTRL+V to paste it in your terminal and press Enter key to execute it.

Your browser does not support copy to clipboard. Please upgrade browser to latest version. Here is the command line for format {{type}}: "{{command}}". Copy and paste this command in terminal to execute it.
Failed to get command URL's for Gelf, LTSV and RFC 5424. You will not be able to use these commands.
